Articles.Content:
I think we should be able to add a description to our rockets, so we know which rocket to select before selecting them.

I name my rockets like

"Alpha-I"

"Bravo-X"

(just to look cool and professional)

and sometimes I forget the purpose of some rockets unless it's a really important rocket. And I don't wanna keep loading different rockets to look at them and try to remember.

Huh? We do have a description feature. When you're naming a rocket in the VAB, you click on the title, and then type in the little box that scrolls out underneath the title. Augh, I suck at explaining, could anyone else explain this?

Boop?

http://i.imgur.com/vqUulnH.jpg

I've played ksp this long and never knew it. Thanks.
